messages.subject: don't interrupt the simpsons
messages.msgSnippet: He warned us that he would not respond to anyone while The Simpson s were on.  Not a healthy situation in my opinion.  It sounds like he s anticipating
messages.messageBody:
"He warned us
that he would not respond to anyone while "The Simpson's" were on. Not a
healthy situation in my opinion. "

It sounds like he's anticipating some interruptions and warning everyone not
to try it. Maybe it's not nice manners to go off and do your own thing
during a family Thanksgiving, but if wacthing TV at Thanksgiving is allowed
at all, then wanting to watch a show without being interrupted seems
reasonable to me.

Annette
